# App Settings

Option Name Value Default Description
Keep running when closed background true/false false When enabled, the app will continue to run web servers in the background even when the window is closed. To stop the program while this option is enabled, click the "Stop & Quit" button.
Check for updates updates true/false true Periodically check if there is a new version of the app available. Updates are not automatically installed.
